short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Now you can play the classic Pacman directly in your Chrome Browser, ad-free, no ads and offline!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Now you can play the classic Pacman directly in your Chrome™ Browser, ad-free and offline! Enjoy the timeless arcade game without the need for an internet connection.

For retro gaming enthusiasts, Pacman is a must-play. Its simple yet addictive gameplay has captivated players for decades.

In Pacman, you guide the iconic yellow character through a maze, gobbling up dots while avoiding four colorful ghosts—Blinky, Pinky, Inky, and Clyde. Your mission is to clear the maze of all dots without getting caught. Eat power pellets to temporarily turn the tables and chase the ghosts for bonus points. The game ends when you run out of lives or complete all levels.

Instructions:

Use the arrow keys on your computer to navigate Pacman through the maze.
